title: Supplement Information - Vitamins, Herbs, and Dietary Supplements on RxList
description: Learn about evidence-based supplements including information on herbs, vitamins, dietary supplements, and alternative treatment modalities.
cleaned_text: Vitamins, Herbs, and Dietary Supplements Find evidence-based information on individual ingredients such as herbs, vitamins, minerals, and other dietary supplements. The supplement monographs on RxList include a description, review of effectiveness, how it works, safety concerns, and interactions with medications. Featured Supplement: [Cranberry](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=203274) [Cranberry](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=203274) is a type of evergreen shrub that grows in wet areas, such as bogs or wetlands. Cranberry is native to northeastern and northcentral parts of the United States. The shrub has small, dark green leaves, pink flowers, and dark red fruit that are egg-shaped. [More
